author: morrijr
msg: Added a build style.  Default is as before, progressive uses a rm, mkdir, cp, build sequence

author: rubys
msg: Get off the ferris wheel where the jar name changes daily....
(personal opinion - what I am building will soon not match
the release, so tagging it thus is inappropriate.  Those that
build tagged versions should specify the version on their
invokation of the build, not modify the build definitions)

author: rubys
msg: logkit is no longer bundled with avalon
